Params: {3: 'A Corrupted tries to sneak up on you from behind, but Vera nails it to the metal wall of the boat with her banner spear before it can touch you.'}
{3: 'Having made sure that it is no longer moving, she kicks it off the boat.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Some of them are not mechanoids native to the city.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "That's strange. If that's the case, where the hell did the Corrupted we've encountered come from?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Swarms of Corrupted are approaching the city, surrounding it orderly.'}
{3: 'Just the sight of it is enough to make one shiver.'}
